languages.text: "Я счастлив быть представленным Вашей Светлости. Мне, скромному слуге Императора, доверена высокая честь быть Корабельным исповедником, сиречь первым духовным лицом на вашем судне. Мне должно следить за чистотой веры экипажа. Я провожу служение в офицерской часовне и присматриваю за корабельным реликварием".

"I am pleased to make your acquaintance, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As a humble servant of the Emperor, I am entrusted with the high honour of being the ship's confessor, or, in other words, the highest spiritual authority on your vessel. I am here to oversee the purity of the crew's faith. I officiate in the officers' chapel and also look after the ship's reliquary."
languages.original_text: "Я счастлив быть представленным Вашей Светлости. Мне, скромному слуге Императора, доверена высокая честь быть Корабельным исповедником, сиречь первым духовным лицом на вашем судне. Мне должно следить за чистотой веры экипажа. Я провожу служение в офицерской часовне и присматриваю за корабельным реликварием".

languages.text: «Es un placer conocerl{mf|e|a}, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Como humilde sirviente del Emperador, se me ha confiado el gran honor de cumplir con las funciones de confesor de la nave, o, en otras palabras, de ser la mayor autoridad espiritual en su nave. Estoy aquí para supervisar la pureza de la fe de la tripulación. Oficio servicios religiosos en la capilla de oficiales y también cuido del relicario de la nave».
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to make your acquaintance, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As a humble servant of the Emperor, I am entrusted with the high honour of being the ship's confessor, or, in other words, the highest spiritual authority on your vessel. I am here to oversee the purity of the crew's faith. I officiate in the officers' chapel and also look after the ship's reliquary."

traits.locale_text: «Es un placer conocerl{mf|e|a}, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Como humilde sirviente del Emperador, se me ha confiado el gran honor de cumplir con las funciones de confesor de la nave, o, en otras palabras, de ser la mayor autoridad espiritual en su nave. Estoy aquí para supervisar la pureza de la fe de la tripulación. Oficio servicios religiosos en la capilla de oficiales y también cuido del relicario de la nave».

languages.text: 「お近づきになれて光栄です、閣下。皇帝の忠実な従者として、私はこの船の聴罪師…言い換えると、この船に置ける精神的な最高権威という名誉をお預かりしております。私がここにいるのは、乗組員の信仰の健全性を監督するためです。士官の礼拝堂で礼拝を執り行い、また、船の聖骨箱の管理もしております」
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to make your acquaintance, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As a humble servant of the Emperor, I am entrusted with the high honour of being the ship's confessor, or, in other words, the highest spiritual authority on your vessel. I am here to oversee the purity of the crew's faith. I officiate in the officers' chapel and also look after the ship's reliquary."

traits.locale_text: 「お近づきになれて光栄です、閣下。皇帝の忠実な従者として、私はこの船の聴罪師…言い換えると、この船に置ける精神的な最高権威という名誉をお預かりしております。私がここにいるのは、乗組員の信仰の健全性を監督するためです。士官の礼拝堂で礼拝を執り行い、また、船の聖骨箱の管理もしております」

languages.text: “我很高兴能与您对话，大人。我是帝皇卑微的仆人，有幸成为这艘船上的告解神父。换句话说，我是这艘船上的最高精神权威。我负责监督船员的信仰是否纯洁。我会在军官礼拜堂主持祭拜仪式，也负责照看船上的圣骨匣。”
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to make your acquaintance, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As a humble servant of the Emperor, I am entrusted with the high honour of being the ship's confessor, or, in other words, the highest spiritual authority on your vessel. I am here to oversee the purity of the crew's faith. I officiate in the officers' chapel and also look after the ship's reliquary."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴能与您对话，大人。我是帝皇卑微的仆人，有幸成为这艘船上的告解神父。换句话说，我是这艘船上的最高精神权威。我负责监督船员的信仰是否纯洁。我会在军官礼拜堂主持祭拜仪式，也负责照看船上的圣骨匣。”

languages.text: "Es freut mich, Eure Bekanntschaft zu machen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Als demütiger Diener des Imperators obliegt mir die hohe Ehre, der Konfessor des Schiffs zu sein oder, mit anderen Worten, die höchste spirituelle Autorität auf Eurem Schiff. Ich bin hier, um die Reinheit des Glaubens der Crew zu überwachen. Ich habe mein Büro in der Offizierskapelle und kümmere mich zudem um das Reliquiar des Schiffes."
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to make your acquaintance, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As a humble servant of the Emperor, I am entrusted with the high honour of being the ship's confessor, or, in other words, the highest spiritual authority on your vessel. I am here to oversee the purity of the crew's faith. I officiate in the officers' chapel and also look after the ship's reliquary."

traits.locale_text: "Es freut mich, Eure Bekanntschaft zu machen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Als demütiger Diener des Imperators obliegt mir die hohe Ehre, der Konfessor des Schiffs zu sein oder, mit anderen Worten, die höchste spirituelle Autorität auf Eurem Schiff. Ich bin hier, um die Reinheit des Glaubens der Crew zu überwachen. Ich habe mein Büro in der Offizierskapelle und kümmere mich zudem um das Reliquiar des Schiffes."

languages.text: « C'est un plaisir de faire votre connaissance, Votre Seigneurie. En tant qu'humble serviteur de l'Empereur, j'ai eu l'insigne honneur d'être nommé confesseur ou, en d'autres termes, la plus haute autorité spirituelle de ce vaisseau. Je suis ici pour veiller à la pureté de la foi de votre équipage. J'officie dans la chapelle des officiers et suis également en charge du reliquaire. »
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to make your acquaintance, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As a humble servant of the Emperor, I am entrusted with the high honour of being the ship's confessor, or, in other words, the highest spiritual authority on your vessel. I am here to oversee the purity of the crew's faith. I officiate in the officers' chapel and also look after the ship's reliquary."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un plaisir de faire votre connaissance, Votre Seigneurie. En tant qu'humble serviteur de l'Empereur, j'ai eu l'insigne honneur d'être nommé confesseur ou, en d'autres termes, la plus haute autorité spirituelle de ce vaisseau. Je suis ici pour veiller à la pureté de la foi de votre équipage. J'officie dans la chapelle des officiers et suis également en charge du reliquaire. »

languages.text: "Tanıştığımıza memnun oldum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İmparator'un mütevazı bir hizmetkârı olarak geminin günah çıkarıcısı olma şerefi bana emanet edildi. Başka bir deyişle geminizdeki en yüksek ruhani otoriteye sahibim. Vazifem, mürettebatın inancının saflığını denetlemek. Subay şapelinde görev yapıyorum. Ayrıca geminin kutsal emanet odasına da göz kulak oluyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to make your acquaintance, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As a humble servant of the Emperor, I am entrusted with the high honour of being the ship's confessor, or, in other words, the highest spiritual authority on your vessel. I am here to oversee the purity of the crew's faith. I officiate in the officers' chapel and also look after the ship's reliquary."
